title: Unable to login
body: Does anyone have issue logging into the game right now? I'm getting the unable to connect to the login queue error.

replies.body:
I also had the error: "LoL new Client unable to connect to the login queue". Even though i thought i did everything good and it was a Riot server issue it wasnt.
Allready tried all Riot's solutions and they did'n work. After some debugging i did finaly resolved the problem myself..

The problem was with a configuration setting in the Esset Security Software. And it was a setting that did'n deactivate even while u fully disable the software (like temp. disable firewall).

In the Esset software you can enable Protocol Protection in the Advanced Settings menu. From then on the software starts controlling all SSL and TLS configuration's and every certificate that comes with it.

I came to this while reading the Log: 2017-05-21T13-09-01_1968_LeagueClient.log
I has the following line:
000012.699| ERROR| lol-login| ALE-4C0F8C92 - FAILED_TO_COMMUNICATE_WITH_LOGIN_QUEUE - Plugin "rcp-be-lol-login" couldn't talk to "https://lqak.euw1.lol.riotgames.com/login-queue/rest/queues/lol/authenticate" because: 60 - "Peer certificate cannot be authenticated with given CA certificates".

This got me thinking that i let Certificates be mastered by the Esset Security software and not by Microsoft. And thus i started searching in the menu and found that i could deactivate that option. It's called Protocol Filtering and SSL/TLS-Protocol Filtering. Once i deactivated both of these settings. The issue was gone.

So this got me thinking, because at some point this did work. Even with the new client. Did something in security changed on the client? Remember the old client did work, new did 2 but after a certain change it didn. So i think Riot's higher level of security also needs attention in 3rd Security Software. 

Hope this resolution can also help others with same kinda problems.

I wasn't able to find a record of login server issues. If you're still running into issues with this, I strongly recommend working through our [**Login Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues), since those steps usually resolve these issues.

If you have any further problems with this, hit me back.

I'm having the same issue. NA English, OS X 10.7.5.

{

     Around Jan 25 5:00AM (PST): Updated the client, played two ARAMs.

     Jan 25 2:20~3:00PM (PST): Played two ARAMs.

     Around Jan 25 7:00PM (PST): Tried to enter the game, but can't login. Unable to connect to the login queue, it said. Haven't changed any System/Browser/Game Settings during these 4 hours (3pm to 7pm).

}

Since the environment hasn't been changed and remains the previously-able-to-login environment, the Login Issues Guide can't help. I don't know what happened in 4 hours, but I really want to get back into the game. I'd appreciate your help.

Since you're still having issues after trying those steps out, we'll need to see some system logs to further troubleshoot this. I recommend running those logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attaching them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our techs can reach back out.

If you run into issues with this, let me know.

What if we've been through this little login guide and still nothing changes. even called ISP and not issues on their end as well. I played several games perfectly fine on my USB tether to wifi last night and then it stopped working around like 2am. tried all the basics and then went into the more advanced things and I've come up with nothing. this has happened to me more than once and It's becoming more of a hassle to play league.
hello... i am a na league of legends player.  My account gave to people steal and use it. THE  game name is TeTeIsWellBB  . account is shidongxiao please help me follow this case  thanks

yes, i seriously cant figure it out either. i can get on the legacy client just fine, but if i try to log into the new one i get ''unable to connect to the login queue'' any help would be appreciated.
